ADN Revit 2015 API Training Material

The ADN Revit API Training Material available on GitHub from the RevitTrainingMaterial repository has now been updated for the Revit 2015 API.

zip archiverelease 2014.0.0.0release 2015.0.0.0

Tech Summit Preview Recording

In case you are interested in listening to what I plan to say about my enhanced cloud-based round-trip simplified 2D BIM editor at the internal Autodesk Technical Summit in Toronto next week, here is the:

  • Slide deck
  • 33-minute preview recording

Enjoy.

Cynicism

Before signing off for today, let me mention two nice and rather positive quotes on cynicism that I just encountered and enjoyed:

Cynicism is...

  • ... expecting nobody to be anything that I am not myself
        – Elias Canetti
  • ... the successful attempt to see the world the way it really is
        – Jean Genet

:-)
